description:
Haruna throws a carnival where Eu is the prize. Later, Sera tries her hand at cooking, and Ayumu is repeatedly probed in a very uncomfortable area!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hai, Kore ga 1% no Kiseki Desu / Youkoso! Kikenchitai e / Ichinen de Ichiban Toko o Tatakareru Hi
Tak, jest zaledwie 1% na cud / Witamy, w strefie zagrożenia / Słońce świeci nad Ziemią przez większość roku
Yes, This is 1% Miracle / Welcome, to the Danger Zone / The Sun Illuminates the Ground Most of the Year
はい, これが1%の奇跡です / ようこそ! 危険地帯へ / 一年で一番床を叩かれる日
예, 이것이 1%의 기적입니다 / 어서오세요! 위험지대에 / 일년 중 가장 바닥을 때리는 날
